body_html:
As @pascalwhoop mentioned, I followed the instructions in here http://www.python36.com/install-tensorflow141-gpu/ to build Tensorflow from source.

Whenever it said cuda 9.0 I changed to 9.1, and cudnn 7.0 I put 7.1.2.

Worked fine, so far!
body_text:
As @pascalwhoop mentioned, I followed the instructions in here http://www.python36.com/install-tensorflow141-gpu/ to build Tensorflow from source.
Whenever it said cuda 9.0 I changed to 9.1, and cudnn 7.0 I put 7.1.2.
Worked fine, so far!
body:
As @pascalwhoop mentioned, I followed the instructions in here [http://www.python36.com/install-tensorflow141-gpu/](http://www.python36.com/install-tensorflow141-gpu/) to build Tensorflow from source. 

Whenever it said cuda 9.0 I changed to 9.1, and cudnn 7.0 I put 7.1.2.

Worked fine, so far!
